oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NewRadial: Revisualizing the Blake Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Saklofske, Jon
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: interface
William Blake
Songs
archive

verbal-visual mediaAcadia University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This essay reviews the attempts of the Blake Archive to come to terms with interface, but argues – implicitly – by inventing a new visualization system and theorizing its difference that opportunities for thinking are lost when archives emulate print practices in digital editions.Full Text: HTML(pdf for download -- right click or control click to save)
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: paj:The Journal of the Initiative for Digital Humanities, Media, and Culture; Vol. 2 No. 1 (2010): Visualizing the Archive
